entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 07:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -21.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -25.0°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
